text: Diego Alonso Hinojosa Aguerrevere (born 2 December 1945) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Tamaulipas. Was president from 2005 to 2011 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Diego Alonso Hinojosa Aguerrevere
